Good afternoon Baldwin Park Unified Families,
We would like to take a moment to inform parents that from 9 to 11 a.m. on Thursday, April 23, we will be hosting a make-up Chromebook distribution day for those who were unable to receive a Chromebook for their student prior to Spring Break.

If your child is in need of a device, please complete the online application no later than 11 a.m. Wednesday, April 22. The form is located on the District website at https://buff.ly/2KorsoA. Once you complete an application, you will receive an email indicating that you should go to your student’s school on Thursday, April 23 between 9 and 11 a.m. to pick up the device.

As a reminder, when leaving your homes, please ensure that you are following the safety guidelines set forth by the Safer at Home Order for Control of COVID-19.

Thank you, be safe and stay healthy! We will all get through this together.

We would like to take a moment to inform parents that from 9 to 11 a.m. on Thursday, April 23, we will be hosting a make-up Chromebook distribution day for those who were unable to receive a Chromebook for their student prior to Spring Break.

If your child is in need of a device, please complete the online application no later than 11 a.m. Wednesday, April 22. The form is located on the District website at https://buff.ly/2KorsoA. Once you complete an application, you will receive an email indicating that you should go to your student’s school on Thursday, April 23 between 9 and 11 a.m. to pick up the device.

As a reminder, when leaving your homes, please ensure that you are following the safety guidelines set forth by the Safer at Home Order for Control of COVID-19.

Thank you, be safe and stay healthy! We will all get through this together.
